title: KiwiLib Sample
summary: Sample app for the Kiwi motion recognition library
developerAddress: 85 King Street East, Suite: 303 Toronto, ON, M5C1G3, Canada
description: The Kiwi library allows developers to create apps that can create and recognize motions. This sample app demonstrates how to use the library to achieve this.More info: http://kiwiwearables.github.io/kiwi-sdk/Source for this app is available at: https://github.com/kiwiwearables/kiwi-sdkPlease DO NOT report bugs in reviews!Create an issue on the GitHub project: https://github.com/kiwiwearables/kiwi-sdk/issuesThanks!
descriptionHTML:
The Kiwi library allows developers to create apps that can create and recognize motions. This sample app demonstrates how to use the library to achieve this.

More info: http://kiwiwearables.github.io/kiwi-sdk/

Source for this app is available at: https://github.com/kiwiwearables/kiwi-sdk

Please DO NOT report bugs in reviews!
Create an issue on the GitHub project: https://github.com/kiwiwearables/kiwi-sdk/issues

Thanks!
